name: joinbox
tag_list: social-aggregator, social-media, rss, feeds, email, inbox, website
overview:
Joinbox helps people to stay connected by uniting social networks, emails and online news on one website.

It is called an advanced social aggregator: Joinbox merges information from social networks, emails and online news on one sweet website with only one login into only one stream. It is an easy to use combination of inboxes which allows you to keep track of all the news you care about. Updates are being pushed live resulting in the most recent information always on top. Joinbox allows you to share information across different services with only one click; no matter if it is email, Facebook, twitter, LinkedIn, or even your own blog. As a result, Joinbox offers you an aggregated address book in one place.
